content: snowdrift blanket is a simple textured yet elegant design > **the pattern is available for free on > my blog here 1 the downloadable pdf > listed for sale contains full pattern > including stitch > guide written instructions chart and > complete photo-tutorial in one > printable file without advertisements ** **materials** scheepjes metropolis 75% extra fine merino wool x 25% nylon 100g/200m 066 copenhagen x 14 balls 3 5 mm hook **gauge ** after 6 rounds hexagon measure approx 10cm/4in from side to side blocked **measurements ** approx 160cm/63in measured from corner to corner after blocking 1 https //www lillabjorncrochet com/2022/03/snowdrift-blanket html
